title: Driver of The Beautiful CEO - Novel Updates
tags: Arranged Marriage   Average-looking Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Contracts   Different Social Status   Family   Famous Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Lazy Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Marriage of Convenience   Modern Day   Mysterious Past   Overpowered Protagonist   Past Trauma   Ruthless Protagonist   Shameless Protagonist   Tragic Past   Wealthy Characters
author: 曾经是少年
description:
Liu Yanbo is a taxi and valet driver. He works all day, but he loves his peaceful, comfortable life. Liu Yanbo originally planned to live as such, blandly. One day he meets a beautiful CEO, and a sudden marriage completely breaks the peace of his life.

A marriage full of happiness, anger, and sorrow begins, all kinds of trouble come one after another, and Liu Yanbo’s unknown past slowly surfaces.>
